response.summary: I am an integral professional fascinated by my field. I have over three years of experience developing software for domestic and international companies both in Latin America and in Europe. My particular strengths are dedication and coordinating team-work. I treat the challenges and objectives of the company as my own and apply my knowledge and abilities to propel both personal and organizational growth. I have contributed to creating an inspiring and motivating environment by taking initiative to propose best practices within the company. I extend my interest in programming to my free time when I actively participate in communities dedicated to Sprint, Jakarta EE and Docker.
response.skills: Spring, Symfony Framework, Kubernetes, CI/CD, JavaScript, REST APIs, Microsoft Azure, Ansible, Microservices, Back-End Web Development, NoSQL, Desarrollo web back end, Google Cloud, Amazon Web Services (AWS), Java, Desarrollo de software, Trabajo en equipo, Middleware, Ruby on Rails, MongoDB

profile_positions.description:
I am a Full Stack developer working with Java and JavaScript. I work extensively with CI/CD, Docker and REST APIs, which allows me to keep in touch with state-of-the-art developments in software. 
I have solved optimization problems indexing database columns and creating procedures in PL SQL, as well as using functional programming. 
I have managed migrations from virtual machines to environments with containers (Docker and Docker Compose) to increase availability, improve provisioning and the updating of dependencies.
I have collaborated continuously with clients to define, document, and maintain requirements.
profile_positions.title: Software Developer

profile_positions.description: I worked as a back-end and front-end developer using Vuejs and Sprint, standing out for compromise and good attitude. I created a chat microservice based in NoSQL Database and Sockets.
profile_positions.title: Software Developer

profile_positions.description: I was in charge of the Middleware area working with tools such as Jboss Fuse y Nagios. I created a graphic interface for remote execution of commands through Ansible y Nagios. This application applied desing patterns such as: Singleton, Dependency Injection and Adstract Factory.
profile_positions.title: Middleware

company.name: Lulo bank
company.description: Somos el primer banco 100% digital de Colombia, que a través de su tecnología ofrece servicios financieros simples y ágiles, pensados para enamorar nuestros usuarios.
